reviews.review_msg: There are times a prof is so good that you wish you could rate them a 65. Kory is one of these profs.  He explains concepts very well and gives reasonable tests that are based on the course material which many profs don't do. Pay attention in class and you will succeed. 1010 would take again
I like his use of classroom experiments, set-up by his sneaky assistant; if it weren't for sneaky, there'd be no point in coming to class. Go sneaky.
